attributes.action: give shops permission to charge ignorant drivers who park in restricted bays and do not have a child, elderly or disabled person with them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Give shops permission to charge ignorant drivers who park in their restricted bays and do not have a child, elderly or disabled person with them.

The parking bays are there for a reason and have extra space for parents to remove children safely from car seats and into pushchairs and to allow more room for the eldery/disabled badge holders. This would reduce danger to infants and young children and potential damage to nearby parked cars due to lack of space.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
